replies.body: Now that we've buffed Aatrox's passive can we make Zac's revive passive better, being smiteable and a 5 minute cool down make it feel pretty useless,i get you guys don't care about him but pls{{champion:154}}
Undefeated in 3 games in the LCS this split. Feels pretty far from weak IMO
Guess you could say he is working ex-{{champion:154}} -ly as planned.
Don't you mean {{champion:81}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:64}}  :) :)?

Maybe using a champion's usage in the LCS isn't the best way to gauge their usability in other tiers. You should probably be looking at the champion's usage and play-ability in all levels of play, instead of the smallest possible percentile. IMO

It's definitely not the only thing we look at. Pick and ban rates can show us popularity or perceived power. Win rates sliced by MMR, mastery, etc. are other ways. There's guys way better than me at it who actually look really closely at this kind of stuff.

I'm mostly just posting anecdotes since I like replying to things. And in general, from my experience Zac is strong enough.
and i for one appreciate you responding to posts... more anecdotes from riot reds could do nothing but help the boards and increase the community....
Downvoted. No puns.
Oh we just heard it from Phreak himself guys. If you win in the LCS you're unstoppable. Glad our suspicions are confirmed by a Red

Actually if you think about it anivia needs buffs to her passive alot more than zac. If you think about it anivia has the worst revive passive of the 3. the only thing thats good about it is you MIGHT be able to get back to 100% hp. The problem is there arent many good situations where it helps since she has no mobility, zac and aatrox can use passive to wait for CD on their jumps then maybe excape but anivia has nothing. Not only that but anivia's passive doesnt do anything like zac (health blobs) or aatrox (attack speed, but it kinda gives you a not very useful egg thats only good against tower dives. well thats what i think anyways.

The rito game devs say thats it's too hard too create a new skin for{{champion:154}} because they have to make a TON of animations, like when he melts and stuff, but im glad that Rito is addressing this by making chroma packs
The cries for a {{champion:154}} skin have been heard from Rito, and behold, the 5.12 PBE cycle includes Pool Party {{champion:154}} and more!

People keep jumping on the Zac-needs-a-skin bandwagon, yet no one plays him. If people want a Zac skin, people need to actually play him and get good with him. I can count on one hand the number of good Zac players I've seen. There's a very small percentage of Zac players, and an even smaller percentage of them would actually buy the skin. Making a skin for him doesn't make much sense to me. Sorry if I sound rude.
They also don't do it based on the number of people complaining about it.
Zac chromas pls
So who is going to Twisted Treeline now?
depends on if I can get champion mastery.  I know that it would not give the same amount, but still.
That is a big thing for people now huh?

I think you are on to something here.

Swap {{item:1053}} for {{item:3134}} on {{item:3508}} 

Stat Change Ideas:
+80 Attack Damage
~~+10% Life Steal~~
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+10 Armor Penetration

UNIQUE Passive: Restores 4% to 10% of the damage dealt by basic attacks as Mana. This effect increases based on missing Mana.
but i love my {{item:3508}} with lifesteal

Still think the champion mastery system is stupid as is.  It isn't a true representation of skill with the champion, just that you've played it a lot.  My friends and I have played with mastery rank 5 players that are outright terrible, and in spite of being called trash for not having a mastery rank in my champion those games (Zilean, among others) I ended up with not only more kills than them (as support.) but a better overall score _and_ more damage dealt to champions.  If I'm out scoring and out damaging a rank 5 Ziggs as a rank 0 Zilean, this can only prove the worth of the system.

It's just a for fun thing... It doesn't mean you have to be good at the champion

Bronze V players can get it, as can Challenger tier players.

It's like the skin = skilled thing all over again.... Just because you have a skin, doesn't mean you're the best player, just means you have a skin...
Yeah the mastery system is more of a thing that says this isn't my first time playing this champ.
sooooo where are the gragas{{champion:79}}  nerfs?
Riot, these comments you make about the changes is why we love you.

i was so happy to see ekko getting nerfed... i then realized it was nothing.. no nerf to his shield that can give him up to 800 (almost as big as sions...) and his ridiculous ult damage. if only.{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I don't know if I am happy or sad that Caitlyn got a buff.
The buffs to cait were more just quality of life changes, and the passive buff is only as a result of the tank meta so, not much of a change that would make Caitlyn seen every game.
{{champion:102}}  This hand of mine is burning red! It's loud roar tells me to grasp [victory!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cwyVV5_orBo)

Little confused by this statement:
Parallel Convergence:
VISION Granted on cast ⇒ Granted 2 seconds after cast

Does that mean that Ekko won't see the area until 2 seconds after he casts it?
yes but honestly this nerf really doesn't matter cause most people use it for the shield/stun not for vision
I think this means that you have to remember exactly where you casted it before 2 secs if you actually want to make plays. You probably won't see the lining until 2 secs after

Actually you know what? I think it means the literal vision it grants. If you throw the W into the Fog of War it instantly gives vision of the area. I guess now we have to wait 2 seconds, when the projectile actually lands, to see.

can we get the nexus turret audio glitch fixed soon? if you die near a nexus turret that is firing you will hear that firing sound any time your camera can see that turret, even if nothing i near by to be shot.
